metadata.title: CVE-2015-7984 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Horde before5.2.8, Horde Groupware before 5.2.11, and Horde Groupware Webmail Editionbefore 5.2.11 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofadministrators for requests that execute arbitrary (1) commands via the cmdparameter to admin/cmdshell.php, (2) SQL queries via the sql parameter toadmin/sqlshell.php, or (3) PHP code via the php parameter toadmin/phpshell.php.

criterions.comment: php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
